COMPANY.TITLE: Your Organization
COMPANY.MISSING_ORGANIZATION: It appears that you have not set up your profile yet: please enter a company name.

ERRORS.URL_IS_INVALID: URL should be a valid HTTPS address
ERRORS.URL_IS_TOO_LONG: URL too long after encoding: {{length}} bytes (max 18)

ERRORS.NAME_IS_TOO_SHORT: Company name must be at least 3 characters long
ERRORS.NAME_DOES_NOT_MATCH_PATTERN: Company name can only contain letters, numbers, spaces, hyphens, apostrophes and common business punctuation

DEVICE_DIAGNOSTICS.LABEL: Alert diagnostics
DEVICE_DIAGNOSTICS.CALL_TO_ACTION: Try placing you hand in front of the sensor at a distance lesser than you set in the device control panel: red flashes show that the sensor is correctly being able to broacast alerts.
DEVICE_DIAGNOSTICS.NO_ALERTS_RECEIVED: No alerts have been received yet

DEVICE_STATE.LABEL: Device found
DEVICE_STATE.CALL_TO_ACTION:
Please connect your Museum Alert Sensor (MAS)
to an available USB port on your machine
DEVICE_STATE.WAITING_FOR_TLS_SETTINGS: Waiting for TLS certificate and private key

PROVISIONING.EXPLANATORY_MESSAGE_WITH_COMPANY:
You are about to enroll your device
in your Company's ({{companyName}}) fleet
PROVISIONING.EXPLANATORY_MESSAGE_WITH_NO_COMPANY:
You are about to enroll your device
in your Company's fleet

WIZARD.DEVICE_REGISTRATION_MESSAGE: Your device is being registered; please wait...
WIZARD.FATAL_ERROR_MESSAGE: An error occurred: you may need to reset the device and try again

ERRORS.INVALID_FORMAT: The URL format is not valid

DEVICE.INVALID_WIFI_CREDENTIALS: Cannot connect to WiFi with the provided credentials
DEVICE.INVALID_DEVICE_PROVISIONING_SETTINGS: Device received invalid TLS certificate or private key
DEVICE.INVALID_DEVICE_COMMAND: Device received an invalid command via USB
DEVICE.FAILED_PROVISIONING_SETTINGS_STORAGE: Device errored while attempting to encryot and store TLS certificate and private key
DEVICE.FAILED_MQTT_BROKER_CONNECTION: Cannot connect device to MQTT broker
DEVICE.FAILED_SENSOR_DETECTION_REPORT: Device errored while attempting to publish an alarm report

APPLICATION.DEVICE_EXISTS_IN_OWN_COMPANY_MESSAGE: Device {{deviceName}} is already registered for your organization. If you performed an hard reset of your sensor and are trying to register it again, please delete the existing device from the registry first.
APPLICATION.DEVICE_EXISTS_IN_OTHER_COMPANY_MESSAGE: Device {{deviceName}} is already registered for another organization. If you are its legimitate administrator, please delete the existing device from the registry first.
APPLICATION.AUTHENTICATION_EXPIRED_MESSAGE: Please log in again to continue
APPLICATION.PROVISIONING_FAILED_MESSAGE: Cannot provision device. Please try again later.
APPLICATION.COMPANY_RETRIEVAL_FAILED_MESSAGE: Cannot retrieve company data. Please try again later.
APPLICATION.COMPANY_UPDATE_FAILED_MESSAGE: Cannot update company data. Please try again later.
APPLICATION.DEVICE_CONFIGURATION_UPDATE_FAILED_MESSA: Did not receive a response from the device after sending the configuration update command; settings may not have been updated.
APPLICATION.WIFI_CREDENTIALS_COMMAND_TIMED_OUT: WiFi credentials command timed out; please retry.
APPLICATION.WIFI_NETWORKS_REFRESH_COMMAND_TIMED_OUT: WiFi networks refresh request timed out; please retry.
APPLICATION.IOT_POLICY_ATTACHMENT_FAILED_MESSAGE: It was not possible to complete your registration; please log in again

WARNINGS.ABOUT_TO_UNREGISTER_AND_RESET_SENSOR_MES: Device {{deviceName}} is about to be unregistered from your Company and reset to factory settings. This operation cannot be undone. Are you sure you want to proceed?
